refnamediv.refpurpose: Permanently changes the language of Scilab's user interface.

listitem.para: a string made of a two-letter, lower-case, ISO Language Code, optionally followed by an underscore and a two-letter, upper-case, ISO country code), such as: 'fr', 'en', 'en_US', 'ru_RU', 'zh_TW'...

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: setdefaultlanguage(language) changes the language used by Scilab user interface, including help, error messages, and saves this changes as the default for subsequent runs of Scilab.
Menus will only be changed to the new language once Scilab is restarted.
setdefaultlanguage('') resets the language to the system value.
setdefaultlanguage only works on Windows. On others operating systems, it does nothing and always returns %f.
